title: Episode 34 - Daniel Ramot, Co-founder/CEO of Via
description: On Tuesday, January 21, 2020, Cornell Tech @ Bloomberg featured Daniel Ramot, Co-founder & CEO of Via, in conversation with Scarlet Fu of Bloomberg Television. They talked about Via’s place in the rideshare market, how Ramot’s Ph.D. in neuroscience was the perfect preparation for launching the company, why it chose to partner with cities to transform public transit, and where it might go next, as well as entrepreneurism.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
